update.description:
In model editor, now users can do these two things from both the list widget and the 3D view:

* Right click for context menu to delete links or joints 

* Select links / joints and see it selected in both places

issue #1546, issue #1525
update.title: Add model editor selection events and delete menu option

content.html:
An alternative for:

for (auto &item : this->selected)
  {
    if (item)
      item->setSelected(false);
  }

content.raw: Don't you prefer to declare it as a `std::recursive_mutex` instead of a pointer and forget about the `delete`?
content.html: Don't you prefer to declare it as a std::recursive_mutex instead of a pointer and forget about the delete?

pull_request.title: Add model editor selection events and delete menu option

pullrequest.title: Add model editor selection events and delete menu option

content.html:
As an alternative you can replace the whole if block with:

this->SetSelected(vis, it == this->selectedJoints.end());

or

auto found = std::find(this->selectedJoints.begin(), this->selectedJoints.end(), vis) != this->selectedJoints.end();
this->SetSelected(vis, !found);

a
